name: World Congress and Expo on Surgery and Anesthesia - HYBRID EVENT
content: Dear 2022 Surgery and Anesthesia Conference participants, I heartily welcome you all to this highly interesting meeting. We all know that Covid-19 recently forced us to stay apart and not to attend scientific gatherings, which I bet is something none of us likes, but finally, after a long waiting time, we might be again able to exchange our ideas in person. I am sure we will have many opportunities to branch out, gain new contacts and build solid scientific relationships. Looking forward to meeting you at the conference. Best Regards, Raffaele Pilla, PharmD, PhD Premiata Farmacia Fatebenefratelli St. John of God - Fatebenefratelli Hospital Benevento - Italy MEDWIDE GROUP invites you to join the global event World Congress and Expo on Surgery and Anesthesia is going to be held August 25-26, 2022 in Rome Italy. That impacts the advancements and technology trends in Surgery and Anesthesia The theme of the conference is "Accelerating Advanced Research and Innovation in Surgery". Surgery Conference will discuss the latest research outcomes and technological advancements in the field bringing together leading surgeons, physicians, research scholars to exchange their views on critical aspects of surgery research. This Conference is designed in a way to provide an exclusive platform for new researchers and scholars to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and practical challenges encountered, and the solutions adopted in the field of Surgery. Surgery Conference is focused to address the constant effort being made by scientists to improve the existing and invent novel technologies for the future. Benefits of Joining the Conference: · Learn from Top Professionals everywhere on the planet. · Be accustomed to the most recent trends and challenges within your sector. · Get your abstract published with DOI · Get certified for your participation · Knock-Down Geographical Barriers · Great resource for learning new career skills · Learn from the Pros · Global exposure to your research · Make new connections. Whom to attend? · Plastic Surgeons · Researchers · Medical Students · Professors · Dean · Scientists · Noble Laureate · Surgical Nurses · Research Scholars
